text: The men's 96 kg competition of the weightlifting events at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, was held on July 29 at the Coliseo Mariscal Caceres. ==Results== 16 athletes from fourteen countries took part. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !
